biased_text: The white supremacists and other far right extremists are super-gun-owners, they are armed to the teeth, and law enforcement is understandably reluctant to get them het up.

biased_text: Ocasio-Cortez used this weekend’s news cycle to continue highlighting the evils of wealth inequality, and to draw attention to serious policy fixes for the problem.
unbiased_text: Ocasio-Cortez utilized this weekend's news coverage to further emphasize the issue of wealth inequality, and to propose potential policy solutions for the problem.

biased_text: Like many Americans also crippled by student loans, Brewster’s been making sacrifices since she graduated: She put off her wedding for two years and once she and her husband, Ryan, finally got married in November 2018, they decided they couldn’t afford a honeymoon.
unbiased_text: Brewster, similar to numerous Americans dealing with student loans, has made alterations to her personal plans since graduating. She postponed her wedding for two years and, after marrying her husband Ryan in November 2018, they decided a honeymoon was not within their financial means.

biased_text: While Americans still cling to sexist gender roles at home, overwhelming majorities believe that sex discrimination in public spaces should be illegal.
unbiased_text: While traditional gender roles at home are still prevalent in America, a significant majority believe that sex discrimination in public spaces should be illegal.

biased_text: The looting and riots and fires in blue cities across the country today reaffirm that it is not “justice” but “war” that today’s radicals have in mind. From a moment that brought all Americans together in their sense of right and wrong, politicians and groups bent on destabilizing the nation chose division…and got their way.
unbiased_text: The recent reports of looting, riots, and fires in various cities across the country suggest a shift from calls for justice to more aggressive methods. From an incident that initially unified Americans in their understanding of right and wrong, certain politicians and groups seem to have chosen divisiveness, leading to increased tension in the nation.

biased_text: The transgender effort to suppress any recognition that men and women are different and complementary would not matter except for the movement’s political alliance with wealthy progressives and radical feminists who wish to destroy the political power of the male-and-female family.
unbiased_text: The movement for transgender rights, which challenges traditional male and female gender roles, has gained significance due to its alliance with diverse progressive groups and advocates for gender equality, who question the political influence of traditional nuclear families.

biased_text: There are no more major cases against the NCAA proceeding currently, but Wilken has slowly eroded some of the NCAA’s favorite arguments and restrictions.
unbiased_text: Currently, there are no more significant cases against the NCAA proceeding, but Wilken has gradually challenged some of the NCAA’s commonly used arguments and restrictions.

biased_text: Those filings are expected to show that Sen. Sanders, the so-called democratic socialist, made millions from book sales.
unbiased_text: The upcoming filings are anticipated to reveal that Sen. Sanders made millions from book sales.

biased_text: This is also true for students snookered into matriculating at sketchy for-profit colleges, which offer almost no marketable skills or career preparedness to justify the cost. unbiased_text: This can also apply to students who enroll in for-profit colleges, which may not provide sufficient marketable skills or career preparedness in relation to the cost. Additionally, it can affect recent college graduates who happened to enter the workforce during the Great Recession and its aftermath, struggling to find work in their chosen field of study.

biased_text: Former Australia Prime Minister Kevin Rudd ripped Donald Trump’s botched handling of the coronavirus pandemic in a new op-ed, describing the U.S. president as a “quack apothecary” for hyping unproven cures

biased_text: The president and his Republican brethren made all kinds of predictions about what would happen if their tax plan passed, and each of those predictions – from job creation to growth rates to the fiscal impact – turned out to be wrong.

biased_text: This group is small but vocal, and represents a predictable if threatening merging of forces.
unbiased_text: This group, though small in size, is notably vocal, symbolizing a notable convergence of forces.

biased_text: This idea, gaining traction under the hashtag #CancelStudentDebt following the release of Sanders’ college debt forgiveness plan, is bad for several reasons, but naturally appealing in a sort of populist way, since plenty of people choose not to think about second-order impacts and potential consequences of driving our country into even more ruinous national debt than before.
unbiased_text: The idea, popularized under the hashtag #CancelStudentDebt after Sanders' college debt forgiveness plan was unveiled, has been criticized for several reasons, including potential impacts on national debt and potential second-order effects.

biased_text: Miller is the architect of President Donald Trump's hardline immigration policies that have separated children from parents, forced people seeking asylum in the U.S. to wait in Mexico under squalid conditions, instituted the Muslim ban and poured money from the military into border wall construction.

biased_text: I get that the media really want to do some bullcrap horse-race point-scoring partisan sniping right now. But these are actually important questions. And “gotcha” reporting may get you butt-slapped by your fellow reporters at the bar, but it’s actually really dangerous.
unbiased_text: The media may currently be focused on competitive, partisan-based reporting. However, the significance of the issues at hand should not be undermined. While sensationalist reporting might earn praise among peers, it can potentially lead to harmful consequences.

biased_text: President Donald Trump offered an unusual warning to Virginia farmers on Tuesday, suggesting that gun control will leave their potatoes defenseless.
unbiased_text: President Donald Trump suggested to Virginia farmers on Tuesday that gun control could potentially impact the security of their potatoes.

biased_text: The number of April background checks to purchase a firearm showed Americans flocking to gun stores in high numbers for the second month in a row amid worries about the coronavirus pandemic.

biased_text: Trump’s latest anti-China barb came as new figures showed 30 million Americans have lost their jobs during lockdown.
unbiased_text: Trump's recent remarks on China coincided with new data revealing 30 million Americans have become unemployed during lockdown.

biased_text: Proponents of better compensation and labor rights for college athletes have hammered the NCAA on numerous fronts over the last decade, with federal lawsuits, attempts to unionize, legislation in statehouses and Congress, and new leagues that aim to compete for top-tier athletes by paying them more than the NCAA allows.
unbiased_text: Advocates for improved compensation and labor rights for college athletes have challenged the NCAA on multiple fronts over the past decade, including federal lawsuits, unionization efforts, legislation at state and federal levels, and the establishment of new leagues that aim to offer higher pay to top athletes than what is currently permitted by the NCAA.

biased_text: White nationalism-fueled violence is on the rise, but FBI is slow to call it domestic terrorism.

biased_text: As the world’s scientists and pharmaceutical companies seek a cure for the coronavirus, other anti-vaxxers are gearing up for a fight against any potential new vaccine.

biased_text: In a September executive order, President Donald Trump gave states and local governments the right to reject refugees, but instead of saying no, most state and local officials have blindsided the administration by opting in, according to two former officials familiar with the matter.

biased_text: As shocking as it is, even the terrorists of ISIS have been shown for respect for science when it comes to COVID-19 than the Christian Right, American white nationalists and coronavirus truthers. biased_text: Closing the gender pay gap is not rocket science – even though recently graduated female rocket scientists earn 89 cents on the dollar to their male peers.

biased_text: The destruction of the middle class is destroying democracies and paving the way for authoritarian rule.

biased_text: Gov. biased_text: Even before Trump started to make a big show out of not wearing a mask, it was common, at least in my South Philadelphia neighborhood, to see MAGA-hat-clad white men walking around without masks, delivering contemptuous sneers to the rest of us suckers who are covering our noses and mouths.

biased_text: For far too many on the left, chaos is the point. Destruction is the goal. They prefer the unknown madness that lies ahead to whatever is still managing to (barely) hold us together in the present.

biased_text: President Trump's two-day visit to India turned to substance Tuesday after opening with a heavy dose of pomp and pageantry, but few concrete accomplishments were expected from the whirlwind trip.

biased_text: Shortly after he took office on Monday, California's Democratic Gov.
